data.name: What's Left
data.detailed_description:
What's Left is a retro styled action, adventure game with exploration, combat, intense set pieces, and a rich story focused cinematic experience.

STORY
Landon Ferngrass is a young boy struggling to make amends for his past mistakes. With the help of his shapeshifting friend, Picaro, they set forth to locate a magical artifact, called the Fire Pearl: which is believed to contain the same flame all souls are born from.
Together they travel the globe, confront their demons, make new friends, reconcile with some old ones, overcome deadly threats, and are forced to face the harsh truths secrets are meant to protect us from.

data.short_description: What's Left is a retro styled action, adventure game with exploration, combat, intense set pieces, and a rich story focused cinematic experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Language, Violence, Mature Situations, Nudity
